languages.text: {n}Проктор Антар, отложив оружие, молча взирает на умирающий пожар и то, что еще недавно символизировало торжество Лекс Империалис. Глаза его темны как глубины океана.{/n}

{n}Solomorne, his weapon lying beside him, stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор Антар, отложив оружие, молча взирает на умирающий пожар и то, что еще недавно символизировало торжество Лекс Империалис. Глаза его темны как глубины океана.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne holsters his weapon and stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}

{n}Solomorne, his weapon lying beside him, stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、武器を横に置いたまま、消えゆく炎と、つい最近までレックス・インペリアの勝利を象徴していたものを無言で見つめている。彼の目は海のように暗く、底知れない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, his weapon lying beside him, stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、武器を横に置いたまま、消えゆく炎と、つい最近までレックス・インペリアの勝利を象徴していたものを無言で見つめている。彼の目は海のように暗く、底知れない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, seine Waffen neben sich, starrt schweigend in die ersterbenden Flammen und das, was bis vor Kurzem den Triumph des Lex Imperia symbolisierte. Seine Augen sind so unergründlich und tief wie der Ozean.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, his weapon lying beside him, stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, seine Waffen neben sich, starrt schweigend in die ersterbenden Flammen und das, was bis vor Kurzem den Triumph des Lex Imperia symbolisierte. Seine Augen sind so unergründlich und tief wie der Ozean.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Son arme posée à ses côtés, Solomorne fixe en silence les flammes mourantes et ce qui symbolisait récemment encore le triomphe de la Lex Imperialis. Ses yeux sont aussi sombres et insondables qu'un puits sans fond.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, his weapon lying beside him, stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Son arme posée à ses côtés, Solomorne fixe en silence les flammes mourantes et ce qui symbolisait récemment encore le triomphe de la Lex Imperialis. Ses yeux sont aussi sombres et insondables qu'un puits sans fond.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Habiendo depositado su arma junto a él, Solomorne contempla en silencio las llamas moribundas y lo que hasta hace poco simbolizaba el triunfo de la Lex Imperialis. Su expresión es tan oscura e insondable como el océano.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, his weapon lying beside him, stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Habiendo depositado su arma junto a él, Solomorne contempla en silencio las llamas moribundas y lo que hasta hace poco simbolizaba el triunfo de la Lex Imperialis. Su expresión es tan oscura e insondable como el océano.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙默默地盯着奄奄一息的火焰，看着不久前还是帝国法典的象征。他的武器躺在他身边，他的双眼像大海一样黑暗、深不可测。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, his weapon lying beside him, stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙默默地盯着奄奄一息的火焰，看着不久前还是帝国法典的象征。他的武器躺在他身边，他的双眼像大海一样黑暗、深不可测。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silahını yanına bırakmış olan Solomorne, sönmekte olan alevlere ve bir süre önceye dek Lex İmperialis'in muzaffer nişanesi sayılan harabenin hatırasına dalgın dalgın bakıyor. Gözleri, karanlık ve derin bir okyanusu andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, his weapon lying beside him, stares silently at the dying flames and at what until recently symbolised the triumph of the Lex Imperialis. His eyes are as dark and fathomless as the ocean.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, silahını yanına bırakmış, sönmekte olan alevlere ve bir süre önceye dek Lex İmperialis'in muzaffer nişanesi sayılan harabenin hatırasına dalgın dalgın bakıyordu. Gözleri, karanlık ve derin bir okyanusu andırıyordu.{/n}
